spell_tooltip.description: You perform a Mighty Ox Kick, hurling your enemy a distance behind you.
Revival's cooldown is reduced by 16%, and provides immunity to magical damage and harmful effects for 2 sec.

Forms a sphere of Hope or Despair above the target. Only one of each sphere can be active at a time.

 Sphere of Hope: Heals for 278,747 and increases your healing done to the target by 15%.
 Sphere of Despair: Deals 297,861 Nature damage, Target deals 3% less damage, and takes 10% increased damage from all sources.

Heals the target for 1.2 million over 6.0 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.

Each heal has a chance to cause a Gust of Mists on the target.

Heals the target for 1.2 million over 6.0 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.

Each heal has a chance to cause a Gust of Mists on the target.

Kick upwards, dealing 426,100 Physical damage.

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.

Kick upwards, dealing 421,138 Physical damage.

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds
Reduces all damage taken by you and your target while channeling Soothing Mists by 6%.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Rising Sun Kick deals 70% increased damage. Spinning Crane Kick deals 10% additional damage.
Increases all healing taken by 4%.
Reduces all damage taken by 6%.
Detox additionally removes all Poison and Disease effects.
Every 10 sec, your next Vivify becomes instant and its healing is increased by 20%.
Paralysis now removes all Enrage effects from its target.
Jabs the target in the throat, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 3 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Paralysis by 8 sec and the cooldown of Leg Sweep by 5 sec.

Every 15 sec, your next Rising Sun Kick or Vivify releases a wave of Chi energy that flows through friends and foes, dealing 16,864 Nature damage or 68,999 healing. Bounces up to 7 times to targets within 25 yards.
Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.
Reduces the cooldown of Roll by 5 sec and increases its maximum number of charges by 1.
Increases all damage dealt by 2%.
Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
Increases the range of Leg Sweep by 4 yds.
Expel Harm's healing increased by 5% and critical strike chance increased by 15%.
Find resilience in the flow of chi in battle, gaining a magic absorb shield for 1.0% of your max health every 3 sec in combat, stacking up to 10%.

Turns your skin to stone for 15 sec, increasing your current and maximum health by 30% and reducing all damage you take by 30%.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.
When your healing spells heal an ally whose health is below 35% maximum health, you gain an additional 10% healing for the next 4 sec.
Expel Harm's healing is increased by up to 30%, based on your missing health.
Increases your maximum health by an additional 10% and your damage taken is reduced by an additional 10% while Fortifying Brew is active.
Magical damage done increased by 4% and healing done increased by 4%.

When a hit deals more than 12% of your maximum health, reduce all damage you take by 40% for 6 sec.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.
Increases your Physical damage done by 4% and Avoidance increased by 4%.
Roll causes you to become lighter than air, allowing you to double jump to dash forward a short distance once within 5 sec, but the cooldown of Roll is increased by 2 sec.

You gain a bonus effect based on your current health.

Above 90% health: Movement speed increased by 5%. This bonus stacks with similar effects.

Between 90% and 35% health: Damage taken reduced by 5%.

Below 35% health: Healing received increased by 10%.
Touch of Death increases your damage by 5% for 30 sec after being cast and its cooldown is reduced by 90 sec.

Wraps the target in healing mists, healing for 574,375 over 7 sec, and increasing healing received from your other spells by 40%. 

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds.

Receive a jolt of energy, empowering your next spell cast:

Enveloping Mist: Immediately heals for 352,223 and is instant cast.
Renewing Mist: Duration increased by 10 sec.
Vivify: No mana cost.
Rising Sun Kick: Cooldown reduced by 9 sec.
Expel Harm: Transfers 25% additional healing into damage and creates a Chi Cocoon absorbing 1.6 million damage.

Surrounds the target with healing mists, restoring 292,740 health over 20 sec.

If Renewing Mist heals a target past maximum health, it will travel to another injured ally within 20 yds.

Encases the target in a cocoon of Chi energy for 12 sec, absorbing 4.8 million damage and increasing all healing over time received by 50%.

Applies Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist to the target.

For every 250,000 Mana you spend, you gain 1 stack of Mana Tea, with a chance equal to your critical strike chance to generate 1 extra stack.

Mana Tea:
Consumes 1 stack of Mana Tea per 0.2 sec to restore 53,550 Mana and reduces the Mana cost of your spells by 30% for 1.00 sec per stack of Mana Tea consumed after drinking.

Can be cast while moving, but movement speed is reduced by 40% while channeling.
Vivify heals all allies with your Renewing Mist active for 141,555, reduced beyond 5 allies.

Rising Sun Kick now kicks up a Gust of Mist to heal 2 allies within 40 yds for 91,725. 

Spinning Crane Kick and Blackout Kick have a chance to kick up a Gust of Mist to heal 1 ally within 40 yds for 90,029.

Heals all party and raid members within 40 yds for 1.6 million and clears them of 3 harmful Magic, all Poison, and all Disease effects.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
The absorb amount of Life Cocoon is increased by 80%.
Mana Tea now channels 50% faster and generates 20% more Mana.

Renewing Mist's heal over time has a chance to cause your next Vivify to also trigger a Zen Pulse on its target and all allies with Renewing Mist, healing them for 179,512 increased by 6% per Renewing Mist active, up to 30%.
Life Cocoon applies Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist to the target.

Summon an effigy of Chi-Ji for 12 sec that kicks up 3 Gust of Mists when you Blackout Kick, Rising Sun Kick, or Spinning Crane Kick, healing up to 2 allies for 90,598, and reducing the cost and cast time of your next Enveloping Mist by 33%, stacking.

Chi-Ji's presence makes you immune to movement impairing effects.
After you fully consume Thunder Focus Tea, your next Vivify triggers Zen Pulse.
Rising Sun Kick and Enveloping Mist apply Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds.
Reduces the cooldown of Life Cocoon by 45 sec.
Increases Enveloping Mist's duration by 1 sec and its healing bonus by 10%.

While active, Yu'lon and Chi'Ji heal up to 5 nearby targets with Enveloping Breath when you cast Enveloping Mist, healing for 188,881 over 7 sec, and increasing the healing they receive from you by 10%.

When activated, Yu'lon and Chi'Ji apply Chi Cocoons to 5 targets within 40 yds, absorbing 1.2 million damage for 10 sec.
Renewing Mist increases its target's healing received from you by 50% for the first 8 sec of its duration, but cannot jump to a new target during this time.

Draws in all nearby clouds of mist, healing the friendly target and up to 4 nearby allies for 154,945 per cloud absorbed.

A cloud of mist is generated every 4 sec while in combat.

Strike the ground fiercely to expose a path of jade for 30 sec, dealing 91,515 Nature damage to up to 5 enemies, and restoring 186,983 health to up to 5 allies within 30 yds caught in the path.

Your abilities have a 6% chance of resetting the cooldown of Jadefire Stomp while fighting within the path.
Reduces the cooldown of Invoke Chi-Ji, the Red Crane by 1 min, but decreases its duration to 12 sec.
Casting Thunder Focus Tea increases your next Crackling Jade Lightning's damage by 2,000% and causes it to chain to 4 additional enemies at 25% effectiveness.

Your abilities reset Jadefire Stomp 100% more often. While within Jadefire Stomp, your Tiger Palms strike twice, your Blackout Kicks strike an additional 2 targets at 20% effectiveness, and your Spinning Crane Kick heals 3 nearby allies for 120% of the damage done.

After casting Jadefire Stomp or Thunder Focus Tea, Ancient Teachings transfers an additional 215% damage to healing for 15 sec.

While Jadefire Teachings is active, your Stamina is increased by 5%.

After using Thunder Focus Tea, your next spell gives 8% of a stat for 10 sec:
Enveloping Mist: Critical strike
Renewing Mist: Haste
Vivify: Mastery
Rising Sun Kick: Versatility
Expel Harm: Versatility
Increases Sheilun's Gift cloud of mist generation to every 4 sec.
Rising Sun Kick heals all allies with your Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist for 26,791, and extends those effects by 4 sec, up to 100% of their original duration.
Sheilun's Gift heals 2 additional allies and its cast time is reduced by 0.5 sec.

The August Celestials empower you, causing you to radiate 6.2 million healing onto up to 5 injured allies and 3.9 million Nature damage onto enemies within 20 yds over 3.0 sec, split evenly among them. Healing and damage increased by 6% per target, up to 30%.

You may move while channeling, but casting other healing or damaging spells cancels this effect.
The healing of Enveloping Mist and Vivify is increased by 6%.

Tiger Palm and Vivify have a chance to cause Xuen to claw a nearby enemy for 313,647 Physical damage, healing a nearby ally for 200% of the damage done.

Invoke Yu'lon, the Jade Serpent or Invoke Chi-Ji, the Red Crane guarantees your next cast activates this effect.
Gain Refreshing Jade Wind while Chi-Ji, the Red Crane or Yu'lon, the Jade Serpent is active.
Sheilun's Gift calls upon Yu'lon to decrease the cooldown time of Renewing Mist, Rising Sun Kick, Life Cocoon, and Thunder Focus Tea by 75% for up to 8 sec, based on the clouds of mist consumed.
After Xuen assists you, your next Enveloping Mist's cast time is reduced by 50% and causes Niuzao to grant an absorb shield to 5 nearby allies for 3% of your maximum health.
Refreshing Jade Wind and Spinning Crane Kick have a chance to cause Chi-Ji to grant you a stack of Mana Tea and quickly rush to 5 allies, healing each target for 139,373.

You heal for 10% of your maximum health instantly when you activate Celestial Conduit and receive 15% less damage for its duration. 

This effect lingers for an additional 8 sec after Celestial Conduit ends.
Your movement speed is increased by 75% during Celestial Conduit and by 15% for 3 sec after being assisted by any Celestial.
Casting Jadefire Stomp increases the damage or healing of your next Rising Sun Kick by 30% or Vivify by 50%.

Celestial Conduit can be recast once during its duration to call upon all of the August Celestials to assist you at 200% effectiveness.

Unity Within is automatically cast when Celestial Conduit ends if not used before expiration.

Heals the target for 1.2 million over 6.0 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.

Each heal has a chance to cause a Gust of Mists on the target.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.

Kick upwards, dealing 428,371 Physical damage.

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.

Kick upwards, dealing 419,236 Physical damage.

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds
Grants an additional charge of Roll and Chi Torpedo.
Reduces all damage taken by 6%.
Vivify healing is increased by 40%.
Detox additionally removes all Poison and Disease effects.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.

Reduces the cooldown of Paralysis by 8 sec and the cooldown of Leg Sweep by 5 sec.

Jabs the target in the throat, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 3 sec.

Turns your skin to stone for 15 sec, increasing your current and maximum health by 30% and reducing all damage you take by 30%.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.

Hurls a torrent of Chi energy up to 40 yds forward, dealing 241,317 Nature damage to all enemies, and 252,347 healing to the Monk and all allies in its path. Healing and damage reduced beyond 5 targets.
Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
Rising Sun Kick deals 70% increased damage. Spinning Crane Kick deals 10% additional damage.
Reduces the cooldown of Roll by 5 sec and increases its maximum number of charges by 1.
Fortifying Brew cooldown reduced by 30 sec.
Expel Harm's critical healing is increased by 15%.
Find resilience in the flow of chi in battle, gaining a magic absorb shield for 1.0% of your max health every 3 sec in combat, stacking up to 10%.
Reduces all damage you take by 20% to 50% for 10 sec, with larger attacks being reduced by more.
Expel Harm's healing is increased by up to 30%, based on your missing health.
You and your allies within 10 yards have 8% increased healing taken from all sources.
You and your allies within 10 yards take 4% reduced damage from area-of-effect attacks.
When your healing spells heal an ally whose health is below 35% maximum health, you gain an additional 10% healing for the next 4 sec.

When a hit deals more than 12% of your maximum health, reduce all damage you take by 40% for 6 sec.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.

Wraps the target in healing mists, healing for 574,375 over 7 sec, and increasing healing received from your other spells by 40%. 

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds.

Surrounds the target with healing mists, restoring 292,740 health over 20 sec.

If Renewing Mist heals a target past maximum health, it will travel to another injured ally within 20 yds.

Encases the target in a cocoon of Chi energy for 12 sec, absorbing 4.8 million damage and increasing all healing over time received by 50%.

Applies Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist to the target.

Receive a jolt of energy, empowering your next spell cast:

Enveloping Mist: Immediately heals for 345,920 and is instant cast.
Renewing Mist: Duration increased by 10 sec.
Vivify: No mana cost.
Rising Sun Kick: Cooldown reduced by 9 sec.
Expel Harm: Transfers 25% additional healing into damage and creates a Chi Cocoon absorbing 1.6 million damage.

Mana Tea:
Consumes 1 stack of Mana Tea per 0.2 sec to restore 53,550 Mana and reduces the Mana cost of your spells by 30% for 1.00 sec per stack of Mana Tea consumed after drinking.

Can be cast while moving, but movement speed is reduced by 40% while channeling.

Tiger Palm causes your next Blackout Kick to strike an additional time, stacking up to 4.

Blackout Kick has a 20% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Rising Sun Kick.

Heals all party and raid members within 40 yds for 1.7 million and clears them of 3 harmful Magic, all Poison, and all Disease effects.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
Vivify heals all allies with your Renewing Mist active for 140,388, reduced beyond 5 allies.
Drink a healing elixir, healing you for 10% of your maximum health.

Renewing Mist's heal over time has a chance to cause your next Vivify to also trigger a Zen Pulse on its target and all allies with Renewing Mist, healing them for 173,981 increased by 6% per Renewing Mist active, up to 30%.
Life Cocoon applies Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist to the target.

Summon an effigy of Chi-Ji for 12 sec that kicks up 3 Gust of Mists when you Blackout Kick, Rising Sun Kick, or Spinning Crane Kick, healing up to 2 allies for 90,234, and reducing the cost and cast time of your next Enveloping Mist by 33%, stacking.

Chi-Ji's presence makes you immune to movement impairing effects.
Zen Pulse triggers a second time at 80% effectiveness if cast on targets with Enveloping Mist.
Rising Sun Kick and Enveloping Mist apply Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds.
Reduces the cooldown of Life Cocoon by 45 sec.
Increases Enveloping Mist's duration by 1 sec and its healing bonus by 10%.

Mana Tea now channels 50% faster and generates 20% more Mana.

Your abilities have a 6% chance of resetting the cooldown of Jadefire Stomp while fighting within the path.
Your Tiger Palm, Blackout Kick, Rising Sun Kick, and Crackling Jade Lightning heal up to 5 injured allies within 40 yds for 30% of the damage done, split evenly among them.
Reduces the cooldown of Invoke Chi-Ji, the Red Crane by 1 min, but decreases its duration to 12 sec.

Draws in all nearby clouds of mist, healing the friendly target and up to 4 nearby allies for 154,945 per cloud absorbed.

A cloud of mist is generated every 4 sec while in combat.
Your Blackout Kicks strike 3 targets and have an additional 10% chance to reset the cooldown of your Rising Sun Kick while within your Jadefire Stomp.

After using Thunder Focus Tea, your next spell gives 8% of a stat for 10 sec:
Enveloping Mist: Critical strike
Renewing Mist: Haste
Vivify: Mastery
Rising Sun Kick: Versatility
Expel Harm: Versatility

Touch of Death can now be used on targets with less than 15% health remaining, dealing 35% of your maximum health in damage.
Expel Harm's healing increased by 5% and critical strike chance increased by 15%.
Reduces magic damage you take by 60% for 6 sec, and transfers all currently active harmful magical effects on you back to their original caster if possible.

Turns your skin to stone for 15 sec, increasing your current and maximum health by 30% and reducing all damage you take by 30%.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.
Your physical damage taken is reduced by 10% and an additional 10% every 4 sec until you receive a physical attack.
When your healing spells heal an ally whose health is below 35% maximum health, you gain an additional 10% healing for the next 4 sec.
Expel Harm's healing is increased by up to 30%, based on your missing health.
Fortifying Brew cooldown reduced by 30 sec.
Magical damage done increased by 4% and healing done increased by 4%.
You and your allies within 10 yards have 4% increased movement speed. Stacks with other similar effects.

When a hit deals more than 12% of your maximum health, reduce all damage you take by 40% for 6 sec.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.
Increases your Physical damage done by 4% and Avoidance increased by 4%.
Roll causes you to become lighter than air, allowing you to double jump to dash forward a short distance once within 5 sec, but the cooldown of Roll is increased by 2 sec.

You gain a bonus effect based on your current health.

Above 90% health: Movement speed increased by 5%. This bonus stacks with similar effects.

Between 90% and 35% health: Damage taken reduced by 5%.

Below 35% health: Healing received increased by 10%.

Wraps the target in healing mists, healing for 574,375 over 7 sec, and increasing healing received from your other spells by 40%. 

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds.

Receive a jolt of energy, empowering your next spell cast:

Enveloping Mist: Immediately heals for 346,229 and is instant cast.
Renewing Mist: Duration increased by 10 sec.
Vivify: No mana cost.
Rising Sun Kick: Cooldown reduced by 9 sec.
Expel Harm: Transfers 25% additional healing into damage and creates a Chi Cocoon absorbing 1.6 million damage.

Surrounds the target with healing mists, restoring 292,740 health over 20 sec.

If Renewing Mist heals a target past maximum health, it will travel to another injured ally within 20 yds.

Encases the target in a cocoon of Chi energy for 12 sec, absorbing 4.8 million damage and increasing all healing over time received by 50%.

Applies Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist to the target.

For every 250,000 Mana you spend, you gain 1 stack of Mana Tea, with a chance equal to your critical strike chance to generate 1 extra stack.

Mana Tea:
Consumes 1 stack of Mana Tea per 0.2 sec to restore 53,550 Mana and reduces the Mana cost of your spells by 30% for 1.00 sec per stack of Mana Tea consumed after drinking.

Can be cast while moving, but movement speed is reduced by 40% while channeling.
Vivify heals all allies with your Renewing Mist active for 141,611, reduced beyond 5 allies.

Rising Sun Kick now kicks up a Gust of Mist to heal 2 allies within 40 yds for 90,402. 

Spinning Crane Kick and Blackout Kick have a chance to kick up a Gust of Mist to heal 1 ally within 40 yds for 92,405.

Heals all party and raid members within 40 yds for 1.6 million and clears them of all harmful Poison and Disease effects. 

Castable while stunned.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
Vivify critical strikes and Rising Sun Kicks reduce the remaining cooldown on Revival by 1 sec, and Revival heals targets for 15% of Revival's heal over 10 sec.

Vivify has a 20% chance to cause your next Rising Sun Kick or Enveloping Mist to generate 1 stack of Mana Tea.

Enveloping Mist and Rising Sun Kick have a 20% chance to cause your next Vivify to generate 1 stack of Mana Tea.

Renewing Mist's heal over time has a chance to cause your next Vivify to also trigger a Zen Pulse on its target and all allies with Renewing Mist, healing them for 178,220 increased by 6% per Renewing Mist active, up to 30%.

Summons an effigy of Yu'lon, the Jade Serpent for 12 sec. Yu'lon will heal injured allies with Soothing Breath, healing the target and up to 2 allies for 117,073 over 3.4 sec. 

Enveloping Mist costs 50% less mana while Yu'lon is active.
After you fully consume Thunder Focus Tea, your next Vivify triggers Zen Pulse.
Rising Sun Kick and Enveloping Mist apply Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds.
Increases Enveloping Mist's duration by 1 sec and its healing bonus by 10%.

While active, Yu'lon and Chi'Ji heal up to 5 nearby targets with Enveloping Breath when you cast Enveloping Mist, healing for 188,881 over 7 sec, and increasing the healing they receive from you by 10%.

When activated, Yu'lon and Chi'Ji apply Chi Cocoons to 5 targets within 40 yds, absorbing 1.2 million damage for 10 sec.
Renewing Mist has a 8% chance to immediately spread to an additional target when initially cast or when traveling to a new target.
Renewing Mist increases its target's healing received from you by 50% for the first 8 sec of its duration, but cannot jump to a new target during this time.

Draws in all nearby clouds of mist, healing the friendly target and up to 4 nearby allies for 154,945 per cloud absorbed.

A cloud of mist is generated every 4 sec while in combat.

Renewing Mist now has 3 charges and reduces the remaining cooldown of Rising Sun Kick by 1.0 sec.

Rising Sun Kick now reduces the remaining cooldown of Renewing Mist by 1.0 sec.
Chi Cocoons now apply Enveloping Mist for 4 sec when they expire or are consumed, and Chi-Ji's Gusts of Mists healing is increased by 20% and Yu'lon's Soothing Breath healing is increased by 500%.

Kick up a powerful gust of wind, dealing 1 million Nature damage in a 25 yd cone to enemies in front of you, split evenly among them. Damage is increased by 6% for each target hit, up to 30%.

Grants Rushing Winds for 4 sec, increasing Renewing Mist's healing by 200%.

After using Thunder Focus Tea, your next spell gives 15% of a stat for 10 sec:
Enveloping Mist: Critical strike
Renewing Mist: Haste
Vivify: Mastery
Rising Sun Kick: Versatility
Expel Harm: Versatility
Renewing Mist's heal over time effect has a 4.0% chance to apply Enveloping Mist for 2 sec.

Each time you cast Sheilun's Gift, you learn one of Shaohao's Lessons for up to 30 sec, with the duration based on how many clouds of mist are consumed.

Lesson of Doubt: Your spells and abilities deal up to 40% more healing and damage to targets, based on their current health.

Lesson of Despair: Your Critical Strike is increased by 30% while above 50% health.

Lesson of Fear: Decreases your damage taken by 15% and increases your Haste by 20%.

Lesson of Anger: 25% of the damage or healing you deal is duplicated every 4 sec.
Each time Enveloping Mist heals, its healing bonus has a 50% chance to spread to an injured ally within 30 yds.
You gain 20% haste for 8 sec after summoning your Celestial.
Rising Sun Kick heals all allies with your Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist for 26,375, and extends those effects by 4 sec, up to 100% of their original duration.
The healing of Enveloping Mist and Vivify is increased by 6%.

Tiger Palm and Vivify have a chance to cause Xuen to claw a nearby enemy for 313,647 Physical damage, healing a nearby ally for 200% of the damage done.

Invoke Yu'lon, the Jade Serpent or Invoke Chi-Ji, the Red Crane guarantees your next cast activates this effect.
Gain Refreshing Jade Wind while Chi-Ji, the Red Crane or Yu'lon, the Jade Serpent is active.
Sheilun's Gift calls upon Yu'lon to decrease the cooldown time of Renewing Mist, Rising Sun Kick, Life Cocoon, and Thunder Focus Tea by 75% for up to 8 sec, based on the clouds of mist consumed.
After Xuen assists you, your next Enveloping Mist's cast time is reduced by 50% and causes Niuzao to grant an absorb shield to 5 nearby allies for 3% of your maximum health.
Refreshing Jade Wind and Spinning Crane Kick have a chance to cause Chi-Ji to grant you a stack of Mana Tea and quickly rush to 5 allies, healing each target for 139,373.

You heal for 10% of your maximum health instantly when you activate Celestial Conduit and receive 15% less damage for its duration. 

This effect lingers for an additional 8 sec after Celestial Conduit ends.
Your movement speed is increased by 75% during Celestial Conduit and by 15% for 3 sec after being assisted by any Celestial.

You switch between alignments after an August Celestial assists you, increasing a corresponding secondary stat by 2%.

Crane Stance:
Haste

Tiger Stance:
Critical Strike

Ox Stance:
Versatility

Serpent Stance: 
Mastery

Celestial Conduit can be recast once during its duration to call upon all of the August Celestials to assist you at 200% effectiveness.

Unity Within is automatically cast when Celestial Conduit ends if not used before expiration.
Your movement enhancing abilities increases Windwalking on allies by 10%, stacking 2 additional times. Movement impairing effects are removed at 3 stacks.
Fists of Fury now reduces all targets movement speed by 90%, and you Parry all attacks while channelling Fists of Fury.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.

Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.
Jabs the target in the throat, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 3 sec.

Hurls a torrent of Chi energy up to 40 yds forward, dealing 233,375 Nature damage to all enemies, and 253,575 healing to the Monk and all allies in its path. Healing and damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Your attacks have a chance to resonate, dealing 12,672 Nature damage to enemies within 8 yds.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.
Summons a White Tiger Statue at the target location for 10 sec, pulsing 56,322 damage to all enemies every 2 sec for 10 sec.

Pummels all targets in front of you, dealing 641,235 Physical damage to your primary target and 346,267 damage to all other enemies over 3.0 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. Can be channeled while moving.
Absorbs all damage taken for 10 sec, up to 50% of your maximum health, and redirects 70% of that amount to the enemy target as Nature damage over 6 sec.
Increases your maximum Chi by 1, maximum Energy by 20, and your Energy regeneration by 10%.

While out of combat, your Chi balances to 2 instead of depleting to empty.

Every 15 sec, your next Tiger Palm also casts Expel Harm and deals 30% additional damage.

 Expel Harm
Expel negative chi from your body, healing for 1 million and dealing 25% of the amount healed as Nature damage to an enemy within 20 yards.
Spinning Crane Kick radius increased by 15%.
Fists of Fury damage increased by 20%.
Fists of Fury damage increased by 15%. When Fists of Fury deals damage, it has a 5% chance to refund 1 Chi.

Spinning Crane Kick's damage is increased by 18% for each unique target you've struck in the last 20 sec with Tiger Palm, Blackout Kick, or Rising Sun Kick. 

Stacks up to 5 times and only applies to the primary target of each effect.

Soar forward through the air at high speed for 1.5 sec.
 
If used again while active, you will land, reducing the movement speed of enemies within 8 yds by 70% for 4 sec.
Rising Sun Kick has a chance equal to 100% of your haste to trigger a second time, dealing 295,864 Physical damage and restoring 1 Chi.
Blackout Kick damage increased by 10% and strikes an additional 2 targets at 80% effectiveness.

Split into 3 elemental spirits for 15 sec, each spirit dealing 40% of normal damage and healing.

You directly control the Storm spirit, while Earth and Fire spirits mimic your attacks on nearby enemies.

While active, casting Storm, Earth, and Fire again will cause the spirits to fixate on your target.
Strike with both fists at all enemies in front of you, dealing 413,888 Physical damage and reducing movement speed by 50% for 6 sec.
Spending Chi has a chance to make your next Spinning Crane Kick free and deal an additional 200% damage.
The duration of Storm, Earth, and Fire is extended by 0.25 sec for every Chi you spend.
Each successive attack that triggers Combo Strikes in a row grants 1% increased damage, stacking up to 5 times.
Touch of Death deals 20% increased damage and can be used a second time within 5 sec before its cooldown is triggered.
Summons an effigy of Xuen, the White Tiger for 7 sec. Xuen attacks your primary target, and strikes 3 enemies within 10 yards every 0.7 sec with Tiger Lightning for 29,090 Nature damage.

Tiger Palm causes your next Blackout Kick to strike an additional time, stacking up to 4.

Blackout Kick has a 20% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Rising Sun Kick.

Strike of the Windlord grants you 4 stacks of Thunderfist and an additional stack for each additional enemy struck. 

Thunderfist discharges upon melee strikes, dealing 136,019 Nature damage.
Spinning Crane Kick damage increased by 20% and its radius is increased by 15%.
Xuen strikes your enemies with Empowered Tiger Lightning every 4 sec, dealing 8% of the damage you and your summons have dealt to those targets in the last 4 sec.

Hurl a brew created from the bones of your enemies at the ground, coating all targets struck for 10 sec. Your abilities have a 50% chance to affect the target a second time at 50% effectiveness as Shadow damage or healing.

Gust of Mists heals targets with your Bonedust Brew active for an additional 143,642.
Touch of Death strikes up to 4 additional nearby targets. This Touch of Death is always an Improved Touch of Death.

Rising Sun Kick critical strikes reduce the cooldown of Fists of Fury by 4 sec.

When Fists of Fury ends, the critical strike chance of Rising Sun Kick is increased by 40% for 5 sec.
Blackout Kick, Rising Sun Kick, and Spinning Crane Kick increase damage dealt by your next Fists of Fury by 3%, stacking up to 10 times.
Tiger Palm also applies an effect which increases your critical strike chance by 15% for 6 sec on the target. This effect cannot be applied more than once every 30 sec per target.

Expel Harm's healing is increased by up to 30%, based on your missing health.

You and your allies within 10 yards take 2% reduced damage from area-of-effect attacks.

When a hit deals more than 12% of your maximum health, reduce all damage you take by 80% for 6 sec.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.

Summons a Black Ox Statue at the target location for 15 min, pulsing threat to all enemies within 20 yards.

You may cast Provoke on the statue to taunt all enemies near the statue.
Smash a keg of brew on the target, dealing 83,235 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yds and reducing their movement speed by 20% for 15 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Clears 50% of your damage delayed with Stagger.

Niuzao's teachings allow you to shuffle during combat, increasing the effectiveness of your Stagger by 100%.

Shuffle is granted by attacking enemies with your Keg Smash, Blackout Kick, and Spinning Crane Kick.
When you Blackout Kick, your Stagger is reduced by 91,542.

When you take damage, you have a chance to summon a Healing Sphere.

Healing Sphere:
Summon a Healing Sphere visible only to you. Moving through this Healing Sphere heals you for 366,693.
Dealing damage with Blackout Kick increases the damage of your next Keg Smash by 10%, stacking up to 4 times.
Drink a healing elixir, healing you for 10% of your maximum health.

Drinking from your Brews has a 100% chance to toss a keg high into the air that lands nearby after 3 sec, dealing 61,825 damage to all enemies within 8 yards and reducing their movement speed by 50% for 15 sec.

A swig of strong brew that coalesces purified chi escaping your body into a celestial guard, absorbing 1.2 million damage.

Purifying Stagger damage increases absorption by up to 200%.
Reduces all damage taken by 60% for 8 sec. Being hit by a melee attack, or taking another action will cancel this effect.

Breathe fire on targets in front of you, causing 45,352 Fire damage. Deals reduced damage to secondary targets.

Targets affected by Keg Smash will also burn, taking 37,511 Fire damage and dealing 5% reduced damage to you for 12 sec.
Purifying Brew now has 2 charges.
Purifying Brew instantly heals you for 25% of the purified Stagger damage.
Keg Smash deals an additional 20% damage to targets affected by Breath of Fire.
Chug some Black Ox Brew, which instantly refills your Energy, Purifying Brew charges, and resets the cooldown of Celestial Brew.

Summons an effigy of Niuzao, the Black Ox for 12 sec. Niuzao attacks your primary target, and frequently Stomps, damaging all nearby enemies.

While active, 40% of damage delayed by Stagger is instead Staggered by Niuzao.
Reduces the cooldown of Purifying Brew and Celestial Brew by 20%.
Activating Purifying Brew or Celestial Brew grants you 10% dodge for 5 sec.
Abilities that grant Shuffle reduce the cooldown on Invoke Niuzao, the Black Ox by 0.50 sec, and Niuzao's Stomp deals an additional 20% damage.
Each time you dodge or an enemy misses you, the remaining cooldown on your Brews is reduced by 1.0 sec. Effect reduced for each recent melee attacker.
For the next 30 sec, your Mastery is increased by 69%. Additionally, Essence Font cooldown is reset instantly and heals up to 6 nearby allies for 45,071 health on channel start and end.
